definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: As a safeguard, officers-in-charge of departments are requested to verify identification by comparing signatures.
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见，部门负责主管应比对签字检验身份。

sentences.english: Then, the effect of the over-consolidation ratio on the results was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 并分析了超固结比对结果的影响。

sentences.english: Then the infrared spectra were recorded by the same equipment.
sentences.chinese: 选择特征性光谱与胆囊癌组织光谱进行比对。

sentences.english: But it is no more absurd than asking it about blacks.
sentences.chinese: 至少这个问题没有比对黑人提出的那个更荒谬吧？

sentences.english: A separation not reconcilable is in opposite existence every day.
sentences.chinese: 一种不可调和的分离，每天比对而存。

sentences.english: Finally, the effects of liquid-filled proportions on fluid dynamic pressure are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了充液比对液体动压力的影响。

sentences.english: However, they're both maximal global alignments.
sentences.chinese: 但是，它们都是最优全局比对。

sentences.english: We'll be talking probably more than any other scholar about her work in this class.
sentences.chinese: 我们对她的讨论会比对其他人多。

sentences.english: The influence of over-consolidation ratio on the critical bearing capacity for strip foundation is less significant.
sentences.chinese: 超固结比对条形地基临界荷载的影响较小。

sentences.english: Life is too short for anyting else.
sentences.chinese: 生命太短暂，我们没有时间去反复地斟酌比对。

sentences.english: I was more turned on by this gravy boat than by Barry.
sentences.chinese: 我发现我对这个船形卤肉盘比对巴里更有冲动。

sentences.english: The effect of density ratio on suction surface and leading edge is more evident.
sentences.chinese: 在压力面密度比对气膜孔流量系数影响较小。

sentences.english: Add cross line in detail K line view.
sentences.chinese: 在历史K线画面新增十字线辅助资料比对。

sentences.english: And also effect of spinneret draw-ratio on fibre aggregated structure and the properties was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析喷丝头拉伸比对纤维的聚集态结构及性能的影响。

sentences.english: On the theory than on the education and training of staff in the problems that exist.
sentences.chinese: 比对理论浅谈我国员工教育和培训中存在的问题。

sentences.english: The split ratio had little influence on the mean droplet sizes at the wall of hydrocyclone.
sentences.chinese: 分流比对旋流器各段边壁的油滴粒径影响不大。

definition: to screen/to discriminate/to reexamine a case/screening (of applicants etc)
to obtain (information from an archive etc)
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to study and come to a conclusion/to judge/to determine
